# MRI DICOM Viewer Project

This is a web application for viewing MRI scans from DICOM (.dcm) files.

## Project Setup Status

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md file created

- [x] Scaffold the Project - Created HTML, CSS, JS, and config files
- [x] Customize the Project - Implemented DICOM upload and rendering

- [ ] Launch the Project
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete - README.md created

## Technology Stack
- Frontend: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript
- DICOM Library: Cornerstone.js for medical image rendering
- Build Tool: Vite for development server
